Text.Language: Picwma nem pic~nof n~tak: pe p~,w e~bol n~te nennobi: nem ]diay/k/ m~beri: e~takt/ic n~nekmay/t/c.
Your Body and Blood: are the forgiveness of our sins: and the New Covenant: that You gave to Your disciples.
